瀲字的基本解释

瀲
liàn
见“潋”。

瀲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liàn］
［《廣韻》力験切，去豔，來。］
［《廣韻》良冉切，上琰，來。］
亦作“1”。“潋1”的繁体字。
(1)水际。
(2)漂浮。
(3)见“瀲灩”。

瀲字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀲； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页660第34
【廣韻】良冉切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】力冉切，?音斂。瀲灩，水溢貌。【木華·海賦】浟湙瀲灩。　又波際也。【潘岳·西征賦】靑蕃蔚乎翠瀲。　又泛也。【郭璞·江賦】或泛瀲于潮波。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?力驗切，音殮。義同。　【集韻】或省作澰。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liàn］
["Guang Yun" cuts, go to Yan, come. ]
["Guang Yun" Liang Ran cut, Shang Yan, come. ]
Also known as "1". Traditional characters for "潋1".
(1) Interwater.
(2) Floating.
(3) See "潋滟".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　潋; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 660 34
[Guang Yun] Liang Ran cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Ran cut hard, and the sound converged. Luminous, water overflowing appearance. 【Muhua·Haifu】浟湙潋滟.　Boji also. 【Pan Yue·Xizheng Fu】Tianfan is almost green.　It's also general. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Or lingering in the tide.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Try hard to cut, sound dying. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】or province as Lian.
